name: searing-shot
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.x-y: The user torches everything around it with an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those hit with a burn.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user torches everything around it with an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those hit with a burn.
